welcome_benefits: 50,000 Reward Points and Complimentary Club ITC Culinaire

Movie & Dining: ₹750 Off on Movie/Non-Movie Bookings Via BookMyShow (Twice Each Month)
Rewards Rate: 10X RPs on Monthly Spends, 3X RPs on Rent and Education and 1X RPs on Insurance
Reward Redemption: 1 RP = ₹1 for Travel and Shop and ₹0.25 Everywhere Else
Travel: Unlimited Railway Lounge Access Across India
Domestic Lounge Access: Unlimited Domestic Lounge Access (Primary and Add-On Cardholders)
International Lounge Access: Unlimited International Lounge Access (Primary and Add-On Cardholders)
Golf: Free Unlimited Golf Rounds/Lessons Every Month. One Complimentary Round Each Quarter Across International Courses
Insurance Benefits: Travel Insurance, Trip Cancellation Cover, and Air Accident Cover

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Surcharge Waiver on Transactions Between ₹200 and ₹5,000 (No Maximum Cap)

product_details: You earn Karma Points that you can use for charity.
Get up to 10x reward Points on your spends.
Get up to Rs. 750 discount on movies twice every month.
Get complimentary golf rounds every year.
Free domestic as well as international lounge access.
Air accident cover worth Rs. 1 Crore.
No late payment fee and no over-limit charges.
